introduction.title: My Skills
introduction.text: Through my academic journey at INSA Lyon and hands-on projects, I've honed a diverse skill set in software development and design. Here's what I bring to the table.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.text: Strong foundation in **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **C++**, **Dart**, **Java**, and **Kotlin**, with practical applications in web, mobile, and data analysis.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.text: Proficient in **HTML/CSS**, **React.js**, and **TypeScript** for front-end, plus back-end expertise in **Node.js**, **Spring Boot**, and **RESTful API** design.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.text: Experienced in cross-platform frameworks like **Flutter** and **React Native**, building performant apps for iOS and Android.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.text: Skilled in **SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL)** and NoSQL (**MongoDB, Firebase**), including schema design and optimization.

skills.title: Version Control
skills.text: Skilled in **Git**, adept at managing code changes and resolving conflicts. Proficient in **GitHub** and **GitLab** for version control, collaboration, and continuous integration.

skills.title: Docker
skills.text: Understanding of **Docker** and **Docker Compose**, skilled in containerizing applications and orchestrating multi-container deployments.

skills.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.text: Knowledge of various **data structures** (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, etc.) and **algorithms** for efficient problem-solving.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.text: Knowledge of **supervised/unsupervised learning**, data preprocessing, and libraries like **Scikit-learn**, with internship experience in model development.

skills.title: UI/UX & Design
skills.text: Proficient in **Figma** for prototyping and **Adobe Photoshop** for graphics, with a focus on intuitive interfaces.

skills.title: Methodologies
skills.text: Experience with **Agile/SCRUM**, **SOA**, and **USDP**, ensuring structured and iterative project execution.
